title: New: Movie – Mr. Fist
body:
Mysterious new comer’s **Movie** impress on their debut track _Mr._

_Fist_. Not much is known about Movie other than that they are from London. Their 80’s groove shows timeless elements similar to Bowie whilst bringing it into a modern perspective. A fresh and reinvigorated take on classic sounds, it potentially marks the start of a new era for guitar music in London.
